p: Mineral mixture also has effects on enteric methane mitigation. For instance, dietary supplementation of illite feed additive, claysized mineral mixture that contains Mg, Ca, K, Mn, Zn, P, Fe, Al, Si, Co, Se and Mo, at 1% on dry matter (DM) basis has a positive effect on CH 4 reduction with increasing VFA production in Han-woo steers [ 100].
